name: Towers (itch) (Mega Games03)
description: In towers, you build towers to protect yourself from bugs. You have to mine ore to make generators and attackers to defend yourself. The bugs have quite the taste for ore and as your Towers grid gets larger they make more of an effort to eat it all. The bugs are determined to get your home base. The longer you survive the higher your score gets, see if you can beat mine! (3510 on medium)
